        public void setMaxZoom(float max)

        public float getMinZoom()
        Get the min zoom multiplier.
        Returns:
        min zoom multiplier.

      • maintainZoomAfterSetImage

        public void maintainZoomAfterSetImage(boolean maintainZoom)
        After setting image, a value of true means the new image should maintain the zoom of the previous image. False means the image should be resized within the view. Defaults value is true.
        Parameters:
        maintainZoom -

      • getCurrentZoom

        public float getCurrentZoom()
        Get the current zoom. This is the zoom relative to the initial scale, not the original resource.
        Returns:
        current zoom multiplier.

      • setMinZoom

        public void setMinZoom(float min)
        Set the min zoom multiplier. Default value: 1.
        Parameters:
        min - min zoom multiplier.
